translations: n.河豚；吹捧者；喷气的人；抬价者

sentences.sentence: One puffer fish has enough toxins to kill about 30 humans.
sentences.translation: 一条河豚的毒素足以杀死大约30个人。

sentences.sentence: There are total 120 kinds of puffer fish all over the world.
There are over ninety species of puffer-fish all belonging to the family Tetraodontidae.
sentences.translation: 河豚鱼有九十多种，都属于四齿科。
